comment: A few drops of water brought out an amazing caramel flavor.

I love the Komagatake series from Mars. The differences between each variant are clear and interesting, but they maintain a good cohesion between them that allow them to be indented as a set. Precision whiskey crafting, so much fun to taste and compare.
Super smooth, sweet finish (bourbon cask edition)
A smooth whisky with notes of caramel, berries, cereal, and spices.

The clean and subtle smokiness is super addictive. You can tell this has some young whiskey in it. I actually quite enjoy the oiliness, because it doesn’t burn when I let it fill my mouth and hold it there. The palate might be a bit thin, but the finish is very clean. A bit hard to find, but I highly recommend it.

Har smagt: Komagatake, 57 %
3 år gammel,
God med lidt vand, skrap duft, fyldig og sødme, lang eftersmag
Warm and woody. I like but not that much.
03/30/19 at Jin’s birthday, Bar Leather has a special “the break even”. I enjoyed it. Highly drinkable light colored. Peat and oil and a sweetness
